resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104085</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104085</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086747</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">PLoS Public Library of Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS allgemeine Bibliothek der Wissenschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bibliothèque publique de PLoS de la Science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biblioteca pública de PLoS da ciência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biblioteca pubblica di PLoS di scienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PLoS δημόσια βιβλιοθήκη της επιστήμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Biblioteca pública de PLoS de la ciencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">PLoS is a nonprofit organization of scientists and physicians committed to making the world's scientific and medical literature a freely available public resource.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS ist eine gemeinnützige Organisation der 
Wissenschaftler und der Ärzte, die am Bilden der Welt 
wissenschaftliche und medizinische Literatur ein frei vorhandenes 
allgemeines Hilfsmittel festgelegt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">PLoS est une organisation à but non lucratif des 
scientifiques et des médecins commis à rendre le monde littérature 
scientifique et médicale une ressource publique librement disponible.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">PLoS é uma organização nonprofit dos cientistas
e dos médicos cometidos a fazer o mundo literatura científica e 
médica um recurso público livremente disponível.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">PLoS è un'organizzazione senza scopo di lucro 
degli scienziati e dei medici commessi a rendere il mondo letteratura 
scientifica e medica un fondo pubblico liberamente disponibile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το PLoS είναι μη κερδοσκοπική οργάνωση των 
επιστημόνων και των παθολόγων δεσμευμένων στην παραγωγή της 
παγκόσμιας επιστημονικής και ιατρικής βιβλιογραφίας ένα ελεύθερα
διαθέσιμο δημόσιο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">PLoS es una organización no lucrativa de los 
científicos y de los médicos confiados a hacer el mundo literatura 
científica y médica un recurso público libremente disponible.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086747</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104085</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/plos-public-library-of-science</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
